title: Fix bulk upload file upload failure

quotes: yes...the file is also not uploading let the file upload

acceptanceCriteria: File input successfully reads selected files

requirements.text: Add comprehensive error handling to the file upload process in AddQuestion.tsx to catch and display errors during file reading, parsing, and the useBulkUploadQuestions mutation

quotes: yes...the file is also not uploading let the file upload

acceptanceCriteria: Try-catch blocks wrap file reading operations
